author: coffee-cogs
install_msg: Thanks for installing :') Come make pull requests over at my GitHub! https://github.com/coffeebank/coffee-cogs
name: sendhook
short: The comprehensive webhooks cog, with sending, listing, and creating of webhooks
description: The comprehensive webhooks cog, with sending, listing, and creating of webhooks. Comes with support for webhook aliases and sending as your username/avatar. Perfect for users stuck on mobile Discord.
end_user_data_statement: This cog does not store any End User Data.
